passage.title: The monkey gets nothing
passage.paragraph: A monkey is hungry. He wants to look for something to eat. At this time, he sees many peaches on the trees. So he climbs the trees and picks the peaches.

Suddenly he sees many bananas on other trees. He then jumps down and runs to the banana trees. Every banana is big and yellow. He is very happy. Then he sees many watermelons on the ground. He begins to pick the watermelons.
A hare comes up. The monkey sees the hare. Then he runs after it.
In the end, the monkey gets nothing.
